entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rockglen
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rockglen 3:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -22.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -27.2°C
Wind: S 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny near noon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the evening then west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
